turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I need some coffee can you help me with an order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to place an order at peet's if I could.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can help you out with that, what peet's location are you ordering from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: its the one on castro street in mountain view

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok got it, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want an iced Havana Cappuccino, since its hot today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok , what size would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: make it a large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of milk would you like for this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i'm trying lose weight, so make it skim milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, I will request that it is made with skim milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great, that sounds perfect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have placed an order for a large Iced Havana Cappuccino

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: when will it be ready

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your order will be ready for pickup in the next 15 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: awesome, i'm heading out now to pick it up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day, and enjoy your coffee

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much, bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye!
